content.raw:
Did you go over the _“Install all prerequisites in your host system”_ section? You shouldn’t have Gazebo 9.0 installed, instead you should have Gazebo 9.11.

[#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall)

Also, it might help to launch Gazebo with the parameter `verbose:=true` to help with the debugging. I suspect that the issue will be fixed when you upgrade your Gazebo version.
content.html:
Did you go over the “Install all prerequisites in your host system” section? You shouldn’t have Gazebo 9.0 installed, instead you should have Gazebo 9.11.

#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall

Also, it might help to launch Gazebo with the parameter verbose:=true to help with the debugging. I suspect that the issue will be fixed when you upgrade your Gazebo version.
